reviews_data.review_text: LOVE this bakery/cafe!!
We had a wonderful coffee break here along with berry Madeleine and a raisin scone. The decor is lovely and coffee was superb!
Pretty place!Highly recommended

So happy we stopped in today. We had a vanilla latte and a honey refresher. The latte was great and not too sweet.  Refresher was very good as well. The decor is very pretty , perfect for meeting a friend or working on your laptop. Staff is friendly and very helpful. Support this sweet local place!

This place has so many wonderful attributes  that truly cater to the customer. This lovely Korean bakery has a beautiful and light esthetic with calming color schemes and an open floor plan. The cookies, cheesecakes and drinks are unique and crafted with the most highest of quality. The madeleine cookies are not overly sweet but are in fact curated in a way that truly highlights the flavor notes making the cookie an experience versus just a sugary treat. Out of the environment and food/drinks, what stands out even more is the absolute warm, inviting and generous customer service. I had accidentally left a to-go order after visiting with my friend and they were incredibly understanding and gave me the opportunity to either get a refund or come pick up a new cheesecake at my convenience. Management is outstanding and they made this process incredibly easy for me. As a customer I was treated with value and felt cared for. They go above and beyond to ensure the customer's experience is one that will have them return again and I absolutely will!

Wonderful little bakery in the mall near Broken Egg Cafe. Pastries are often gluten free and desserts are in the Korean style. I am crossing fingers they might offer a bit more for lunch sometime maybe noodles and soup? Quiet and welcoming. Large Coffee pours!
Very welcoming and great madeleines and coffee !
Excellent service and atmosphere. The caramel cloud latte I had was delicious!
Amazing Madeline's. We finished a box of assorted ones. Hot chocolates were simply beautiful.
people & environment is very nice. though, espresso had a burnt bean taste, that's why I gave two. I will possibly visit again but try some other type of coffee.

I liked Littl Madeleine, I had a cream scone (I should have asked for it to be warned) and cortado. My daughter had a cloud caramel latte with soy milk (happy to see alternative milk options) and a chocolate chip scone. I would have liked more pastry options.
I bought the Carmel latte and a scone with cream. It was delicious! I will definitely be going back
The snacks are so wonderful and healthy !!!   Will be back

I genuinely enjoyed everything they had to offer, not only were the people and customer service very nice but their food is just as phenomenal! I'll have to day my favorite had to have been the peanut butter cookies they were absolutely amazing and I really think this place deserves much love!!
Literally so cute in here, I love cafe's like these and I'm so glad there's one in Charlotte:) food and drinks taste great and such good studying place.
All the fruits are so fresh and organic!

This was my first time trying this place out after having seen it recommended on IG. It was SUCH an amazing experience! The ambiance is so cute (clean, modern, with a hint of cute), and the items I got were absolutely delicious. I got a couple of the Madeline cookies (Biscoff one was an 11/10), and the Cloud Matcha Latte. So so good. Also, I loved the fact that the treats were individually wrapped and I could see the owner herself and the employees very regularly wiping tabletops down. Cleanliness is so important to me and this place 100% has it. Speaking of tables, there was plenty of space to sit and enjoy your drinks and treats. Will definitely be going back here!
Such a warm welcome here. Coffee is amazing and the owners are so so sweet.
The best matcha I've had in a really long time. So addicting. It is also the cutest spot.

It was my first time visiting Littl Madeleine. I walked into the bakery and I wasn't sure what I wanted to order. No one greeted me. Absolutely no one. There was a women on the bakery side that looked at me and looked away. There were two women on the caffe side that never even turned around. There were about three customers sitting in the establishment on laptops. The place was not busy. So, I kind of just wandered around looking at the desserts behind the glass, hoping that someone would say hello or help me or anything. I just walked out and left. I went to Kozi next door and grabbed some Italian street food and picked up a few dessert items there. I won't be back. There are other spots in Charlotte with scones that didn't look dried out.

My daughter and I got ALL OF THIS! This is absolutely my new favorite place. The owner is absolutely precious and the kind of small business owner you want to support. Hands down the best coffee and desserts I have EVER had.
The strawberry cloud latte is delicious and 100% refreshing. The madeleine is good but a bit dry

I was really excited to try this place, but ended up being incredibly disappointed. I paid $22 for two things: A dalgona and an egg sandiwch. I expected to pay $8 for a coffee, as is the norm these days, but $12 for a small sandwich is robbery. The dalgona was underwhelming and tasted exactly like the instant coffee we were all making during the pandemic. The egg sandwich had a terrible filling to bread ratio and most of my bites were just the egg mixture. I also noticed on the receipt that was emailed that the ingredients were listed and the sandwich included cheese. Due to health reasons, I consume as little dairy as possible. Who the hell puts cheese in an egg sandwich? I've been spending the last few hours feeling nauseous and trying not to get sick. I highly recommend that anyone with dietary restrictions not make assumptions like I did and thoroughly read the ingredient list for what you're ordering.

Very cute spot with a tranquil and soft atmosphere. Lots of people working while sipping lattes. I tried the Matcha latte and the vanilla madeleine. Latte was quite good but very very expensive ($9?) The madeleine was also good but nothing spectacular. Would like to try again, but the main drawback is how expensive everything is. Good place to do work in or chat with someone.
Love it! I ordered dalgona coffee & cloud strawberry latte. Very good.

The reason why i gave it 4* is because just like some of the reviews said, it's named after the french delicate treat" Madeleine " but it's not the strong suit. I find them very dry and overly sweet. The cheesecake and coffee however are delicious and very unique. Prices are a little higher too but hey, you honestly get what you pay for. Such a cute, comfortable and good atmosphere. Customer service was great as well. I'd come back over and over again.

We LOVE Littl Madeleine (and Sadie!) I'm fairly certain we discovered them on their soft opening day, when I wanted a late night treat, and as soon as they opened fully...well, we have been every weekend since.

I don't love sweets, but the madeleines are so perfectly made -- a treat without being sickly sweet! The double matcha is the best, but when their weekly rotating flavors includes earl grey or almond, we grab some of those. For us, we buy a stash and they last us as dessert for 3-4 days with NO issue!

We also love the specialty drinks: a cloud matcha or dalgona latte will always be silky smooth and refreshing...but there's not a beverage we haven't loved.

We just found this gem of a bakery in Ballantyne on N House Community Rd through another reviewer. We had the chocolate and strawberry cheesecake that melts in your mouth. They have so many desserts along with great latte's and matcha! We will be back!

Walking into the cafe I was greeted warmly with smiling faces and welcomes. The ambience inside of the cafe is calm and pleasant. The madeleines are very good and there are a variety of flavors. The coffee is very smooth and fragrant. I ordered and Iced Lavender Latte and I recommend it for those that like a lightly flavored latte, as it was not overly sweet and it had balanced flavor of coffee and lavender.  I will be adding Littl Madeleine to my list of best cafes.

Love it! The egg sandwich was light and fluffy, and it didn't have that 'egg scent'. I ordered the Cloud Strawberry Latte and a Double Matcha Madeleine. Both were very tasty. I do wish I was able to get all the 'cloud' from the latte, there was a lot left. Overall, very good, be aware sitting is limited, and the staff is very nice.
Visited Littl Madeleine this morning and we had delicious scones and lattes. Atmosphere is inviting and food is great.

It's always a treat when I come in here!
Filled with aromas of fresh baked scones and of course madeleines.
The dalgona is by far my favorite and the barista Zoie makes it perfect every time!! I'm happy you decided to open a location here and wish you much success. 
** Special note:  Had the pleasure of trying the chocolate cheesecake and it was refreshing like a chocolate mouse pie.
I loved the atmosphere here and everyone was so nice!!! My original bingsu was delicious and PERFECT for such a hot day.  I will definitely be back for more this summer!

This was my first time visiting and I already can't wait to go back! Lovely cafe with beautiful desserts. The basque cheesecakes looked amazing but I went with the madeleine's and dalgona coffee for now. I also asked about the egg sandwiches (there was a sign saying there were out) and the owner said if I waited 10 minutes they'd be made. I waited likely right around 10 minutes and the owner even gave me a complementary madeleine just for waiting. The entire menu looks wonderful and definitely recommend!
adorable cafe, will be returning. it is a bit pricy though (a slice of cake was $12). I will say though I prefer matcha maiko or tous le jour

Such a cute shop! The ladies were such sweethearts! Love the atmosphere, very quiet with chairs & tables where you can sit & Mingle with friends. There were quite a few of us girls so there weren't enough chairs for us in an area as there were customers too, but we enjoyed our visit there. Thank you for blessing us girls today!
Hidden gem in Charlotte with high quality organic ingredients. Friendly service and clean cafe. I recommend the cloud caramel latte and matcha madeleines. Basque cheesecake is also very good.

Littl Madeleine is a hidden gem in Ballantyne. It has excellent baked goods and coffee drinks that are reasonably priced. We like that everything is made with organic ingredients. Atmosphere inside is relaxed. A great spot for breakfast with our toddler!
Just tried them first time. It's amazing! Yum
Pricey but a cute and minimalistic place
Nice little cafe using the best ingredients. Good customer service with a personal touch.

Loved the coffee and Madeleines! Excited to try their egg sandwiches and other flavors of cake slices!
Very clean!
Absolutely stunning coffee shop, amazing employee! Ordered a cheesecake and very impressed. Very clean, quiet and amazing location!
Very cozy place

I love this place!! The staff is so nice and I love the madeleines. The chocolate double creme cheesecake is so yummy. And I always get the dalgona latte. I come here a few times a week and I look forward to their rotating madeleines. Please come to this place!!

I stopped in quickly to purchase a few items to go. I had heard great things about this shop and just happened to be in the area. I was immediately welcomed with a smile. The shop was welcoming and open. There were several customers enjoying their drinks and sweets at tables. The woman that assisted me was extremely kind and helpful. She gave me a suggestion for a coffee that I had never tried before. I wish that I remembered the name to suggest it to you to order, but it was so delicious! She told me that they make their own coffee foam and also the cookies that they crumble on top. Yum! Not too sweet. Just perfect. I also purchased madeleines and a cookie. I had the citrus madeleine. It was so good! Great texture and moisture content. When I returned home, my daughter tried the churro madeleine. She is already requesting more as she loved it as well. I will definitely return when in the area again.

Highly disappointing! I had seen so many good reviews and advertising for the Littl Madeleine bakery. I myself am a fan of the classic madeleine cookies and decided to visit the bakery this past Saturday. The store was clean and not too crowded for the weekend. I got a variety of different madeleines to try and a coffee to dine in. The customers in front of me were filming something for content, as what was told to me by the individual who was holding the camera. This filming included having their madeleine cookies neatly packed in a box and wrapped in a bow of the customer's choosing. When I proceeded to checkout afterward, I did not receive anywhere close to this type of treatment, instead, I got a simple flip of the card reader asking for a tip and no help in getting all my merchandise off the table. I had to physically reach across the counter, which left a cold interaction with the cashier. Finding a table was not an issue, but upon sitting down and trying the cookies, I found all of the madeleine cookies to be dry and lacking flavor. All the cookies were extremely dense and lacked the crisp exterior and moist interior that madeleine cookies are known for. If I had to rank them in the order of decent to worst it would be: the chocolate-covered one, the lemon, mocha, and dead last, the vanilla. The vanilla madeleines compared to the taste of dry cornbread. My friend also tried a peanut butter cookie and a chocolate chip cookie as well, which disappointed both of us. The chocolate chip cookie can only be described as the texture of sand in one's mouth, and the peanut butter cookie lacked flavor. The coffee was not bad, but as a bakery that names itself after this iconic cookie, I find it difficult to support them if they can't even get that correct.
Everything about this place is lovely, the atmosphere is very relaxing and the service is excellent!! We were given an extra madeline and everyone seemed so kind. Would definitely recommend!!!
Beautiful little bakery and coffee shop. I had the double matcha madeleine, earl grey, and vanilla. So, so good. And the chocolate chip cookie was so buttery and delicious.
Great Bakery serving organic coffee and pastries...

We arrived just before closing, and despite the late hour, they welcomed and served us graciously. The drinks were excellent, prepared promptly. We indulged in the matcha, vanilla, and Earl Grey madeleines, all of which were delicious. Additionally, the staff kindly offered us three more madeleines as a treat. The overall ambiance was exceptionally clean, tidy, and pleasantly fragrant.

This place is so welcoming I just got off work(I'm a diesel mechanic) so I wasn't exactly in my Sunday best. But they treated me well like any other customer very calming atmosphere with extremely professional staff.
Lovely cafe. Great atmosphere and tasty coffee.
Great place.  Coffee is very good and Madeleine fantastic

This is absolutely a must stop if you live in, or are traveling through Charlotte. Oh my goodness. Soft music and a pretty wind chime greet you as you walk in. The space is open and light and smells amazing. I found this place through a reel on Instagram, and it exceeded my expectations. I got a couple of the madeleine's, and then one of their refreshing teas, which they make with real citrus. I would have grabbed one of their basque cheesecakes, but I was off to another locale for a full meal, and I didn't think it would hold up well in my car. Next time!
Wow!!!! This place is awesome the drinks & the pastries are so yummy also the service is amazing, thank you for being so kind. :)
Very cute coffee shop, delicious food ( I loved my egg sandwich) and the ice latte wasn't really my favorite.

Find me a cuter bakery in CLT.. I'll wait..
I wanted to try so many things here but decided to start with their namesake, madeleines. These truly are the perfect little treat. I loved the chocolate one. Also bought a three pack as a gift for a friend. Can't wait to come back to try the bingsoo and sandwiches.

Very deceiving marketing.

We went to visit the other day and were excited about the "all organic & pure, unprocessed" quality that this business advertises, but we were unfortunately disappointed with this companies false advertising.

I ordered a matcha with almond milk and it costed $9, which was a bit shocking. After ordering, I immediately noticed all of the processed and unnatural flavored syrups for the drinks. I was so shocked that this business advertises high quality ingredients and what I got was half quality but for a premium price.

Here is a copy and paste from their website:

"Our commitment to environmental kindness, farmer welfare, and the consumption of pure, unprocessed foods is deeply ingrained in our business ethos. Every decision we make reflects this philosophy. For us, sustainability is not a marketing strategy; it's a daily, deliberate choice that guides our operations."

I would highly recommend this business to either:

1.) Stop advertising their use of high quality ingredients if they are going to continue to mix high quality with subpar ingredients and still charge a premium price (greenwashing).

2.) Commit entirely to using high quality ingredients and remove any artificial ingredients, so you can honestly provide a high quality service at a premium price.

I really don't like leaving these kind of reviews but I feel it is necessary to let other health conscious customers be made aware before they try this cafe. I feel it is greenwashed and falsely advertised and worst of all, you're being charged a premium for ingredients that are mixed with artificial ingredients.
Cloud Carmel Latte is the best iced latte I've ever had. Ever. And I've had a lot. I'm addicted

Went to this place on Saturday afternoon/ evening time. This place was packed and had long line. This place has great ambiance and sitting. Most of their Madeline were sold out. Got chance to try their Chocolate and Vanilla Madeline. They also have cute cups but was told that since its very busy they don't have enough glass cups for everyone so they just serving in to-go/ paper cups, which understandable. I was told to come during weekdays to enjoy coffee in Mugs. Our Beverage tasted really good. Enjoyed our time there. Overall 4/5 .
I got a lavendar latte. I can tell they use good beans because my coffee had a rich flavor. I will try the desserts next time I come back!
Just try it.

Very sweet little place, simple and delicious. They also offer GF cheesecake.
My husband tried a Bingsu bowl. It was all very delicious

This bakery is amazing! It has a bright atmosphere but still keeps a cozy feel to it. They have plenty of places to sit and study if you like to do your work in coffee shops. Their madelines are delicious and their cheesecake is too (however I suggest you get there early, as they sell out quickly-- but they do make more throughout the day as needed). Their drink menu is stunning as well, with artistic drinks that look and taste yummy. The staff are super friendly and will answer any questions you have will knowledge and grace! Overall, I was very impressed when I came here!
Don't let the exterior fool you, go inside.  We were warmly greeted.  The scone with whip cream and strawberry jam was amazing!   Highly reccomend.

My daughter and I went here this afternoon and it was everything we hoped for and more!  The people who worked there (possibly the owners) were so kind and helpful!  Everything looked so amazing so we bought one of each and all of the Madeline's were fantastic!  The venue was super clean and the attention to detail was noticed.  We will definitely be back-thank you!!

ordered an iced latte and only had one person waiting for their order ahead of me and it took 8 minutes post order. the coffee is ok but the cup is so small it's almost a kids size and I paid $6.44 and they couldn't even bother to fill it up all the way. gone in 5 sips. based off speed of service after ordering, size of drink, taste, and value that's why I give it a 2 stars. slightly better than McDonald's iced latte so don't waste your money. I'll post a picture somehow of how my hand absolutely dwarfs the size of this kids cup. probably won't be back to get ripped off again.
Loved the egg sandwich and dalgona coffee + the double matcha Madeline. Staff was super friendly, will definitely have to make the 40 minute trip back!!
Cute shop with interesting and unique Madeline flavors

Such a cute bakery. I do a lot of baking and use organic/clean ingredients as well so I LOVE that a bakery now offers this.

I ordered a coffee and a basque cheesecake. The coffee was good, but honestly not amazing. Maybe also because when I got it, it was slightly warm. Had to drive home and rewarm it back up, which was unfortunate. First time having basque cheesecake so I don't have anything to compare to, but it was creamy and delicious. I visited on a weekday and they didn't have much in the window available. Not sure if they only have roll cakes available on the weekend, I was looking forward to getting one. Bummer since I live 30 mins away so I can't swing by as often as I would like to.

I found myself having some questions after leaving and it is impossible to get a hold of anyone. No phone numbers available and no responses on their social medias. :(
The matcha latte is definitely the best one I've ever had. The atmosphere and decor is super cute and the madeline's are super tasty. The lotus flavor is amazing. Will be coming back!
Super cute location! Their coffee is great and their madeleines are really good.
It was so yummy and they were so nice
Like this place! Coffee and sweet treats are good too!
Really wonderful experience, great taste of coffee , excellent bakery stuff and above all decent prices , definitely worth visit
On weekends it gets busy, so the service can be a little slow
The drinks are soo cute and tasty and the service is amazing!!
This place was so good and the service was amazing. Can't wait to come back.

Wonderfully fresh and hand-made food here, the sandwiches are excellent, and the madeleines are varied in flavor and super fresh as well. Great atmosphere and plenty of place to sit or stay while you have a drink. The coffee was good as well. Great to have a new specialty bakery in the greater Charlotte area!
New favorite place for delicious drinks and tasty treats made fresh daily!  Cozy and warm atmosphere and friendly staff.  Thank you Sadie and Staff for opening a beautiful shop for us to enjoy

First time in, this was a fabulous experience. I ordered the Dalgona Cloud latte. I'm very picky with my coffee and this was fabulous. The perfect amount of sweetness and the espresso is VERY well done. I asked lots of questions before ordering at the staff was very helpful. Also the bathroom is SO CLEAN. Will come back for sure! Also do yourself a favor and try the earl grey Madeline. It's such a unique taste and I've never seen anything like it anywhere else!
The loveliest little cafe. The pastries we tried were all wonderful, Strawberry Cloud Latte was delicious and so unique. Kindest staff. Definitely coming back.
Wonderful pastries and lattes!
Very lively and lovely place! Must-try amazing hand-made madeleine and variety of drinks. Everything here is very authentic and has been crafted with care. We had a great time here.

The best caffe that one can be at. First time in and was greeted with a very clean and pleasant environment. The first thing I ordered was apple juice and cheesecake. Let me say this right now, it's the best cheesecake I've ever had, and the apple juice was delicious. They use wooden recyclable utensils. Everything is make natural with natural ingredients like organic flower. They serve their food in very nice plates!
This place excels in taste, ambiance, and friendliness.
Loved the atmosphere and the customer service! Their attention to detail was phenomenal. From the interior of their space to ensuring everything was great with order!
The Madeleine was amazing, no doubt. But there were no sandwiches when we arrived. In addition, they don't make MORE. So either you get there early to get a sandwich or don't go
The coffee is slightly sour, which I don't necessarily like, although the cappuccino is okay. The service is very friendly. The place itself is bright, clean and nice to stay in.

Fantastic! I've been looking for a place in Charlotte that makes a correctly sized Cortado! This place has great tasting coffee, and really tasty madelines - the lemon and churro are so so good. I'll be back here for sure! It's also friendly for bringing your laptop and working.
I got the double chocolate madeleine and the chocolate latte. Both were amazing! The space is bright and cozy and the staff were super friendly. I can't wait to go back!
Nice and cute little cafe.  Everything is made fresh daily and delicious. Madeleine's are perfect, not too sweet. The staff are really friendly.

I visited on the grand opening day. Parking was easy, the entrance is easy to spot, and the interior is so cute!

My friend got the Earl Gray Tea, Earl Gray Madeleine and Double Chocolate Scone.

I got the Littl Turkey Sandwich and Iced Lavender Latte and the 6 pack variety of Madeleines.

Everything was delicious. I love that the sandwich was filling.

They also have a rewards program.
Amazing location, food, service !

I recently had the pleasure of visiting "Little Madeline," the newest cafe in Charlotte, NC, and it was truly a delightful experience. From the moment I stepped in, the modern and inviting Korean-style ambiance caught my attention.

The star of the show is undoubtedly their madeline - hands down the best in the area. The delicate and flavorful treat is a testament to the quality and care that goes into their baking.

The cafe's atmosphere is equally impressive. The modern design adds a touch of sophistication, making it a perfect spot to unwind or catch up with friends.

The friendly staff enhances the warm atmosphere, ensuring that every customer feels welcome. The fusion of Korean influences with a modern twist adds a distinctive flavor to the cafe scene in Charlotte.

If you find yourself in the area and crave a delightful culinary experience, make sure to visit Little Madeline. Whether you're a fan of madelines, a cup of coffee, or simply enjoy a cozy cafe setting, this place has it all. I can't wait to go back and savor more of their delectable offerings.

I highly recommend their chicken salad sandwich, Matcha Madeleine and Misugaru Latte! Especially, Misugaru Latte is very creamy and rich so it can be a perfect alternative meal for anyone who is looking for healthier and more organic food. I love the white and sky blue mixed interior, music and every vibe of the coffee shop! It is definitely a place that I want to revisit later and introduce to my friends and family
What a wonderful Madeleine!!!

A madeleine shop with friendly service and the best taste.  I highly recommend the one that opened in Charlotte.  Matcha madeleines and lemon madeleines are so lovely.  What did they do to the whipped cream on the cake?  A taste that comes to mind no matter how much you eat it.

Everyone working there was kind and friendly. They were selling out of items by 12pm when we visited! Highly recommend getting the matcha madeleines. It's a nice bakery for a date or small get together
The taste of the scones was fantastic that I had never tried before, the service was the best, and I was surprised by the amount of coffee.
Very nice employees, organized and fresh items, friendly staff along with great coffee. Highly recommend!
Nice new find and friendly owner. We will be back to continue supporting.

I fell in love with this bakery ever since I first tasted her madeleines. I'm so glad she opened a bakery cafe near my house!! Her cake is light and moist, not too sweet. I love it. I tried macha latte this time and it was the best macha latte I haven't had in years. I highly recommend this place!

I'm thrilled that Little Madeleine has opened near my home. The shop exudes charm and coziness, with ample tables and seats perfect for enjoying coffee with friends. The madeleines and scones were not only delicious but also reflected the use of high-quality ingredients across their offerings. The organic coffee and tea added another layer of excellence to the experience. I'm looking forward to revisiting this delightful spot in the future.

Amazing atmosphere!
I love madeleines and scones.
I recommend a cloud latte as well.
Will come back to this place. :)
very chill, very calming. great study space, def recommend for a quick stop or anything!

Cute new Korean-style bakery. Fresh cream scone and chocolate chocolate chip scones are tasty. Great texture - crunchy caramelized exterior with tender flaky interior. Just the right level of sweetness. Chocolate scone with a cup of coffee sounds like the start of a wonderful day. Wish I bought more. Madeleines are all great, and you can tell they use great ingredients. Egg sandwich is delightful as well. Will definitely have to go back soon.
Such a lovely place, it is a cute coffee shop. The people are so nice and very friendly. Definitely coming back.
Such a great place
What a delightful little cafe with such a sweet owner. They are currently in the soft opening phase. My soy latte was very yummy. I hear cakes are coming soon! I'll be back for sure!

Such a cute little cafe that just opened. Everything is made fresh daily and in house. Sweet ladies that run the cafe. Be sure to check them out. Madeleine's are perfect, not too sweet, crispy edges and not dry at all.

Good vibe, delicious food and well trained employees.
I would recommend this bakery cafe!!

I had a cortado and a vanilla Madeleine to go. The espresso in the cortado would be on the intense side of the Nespresso scale which I liked (I don't really have another point of reference). I could eat the Madeleines all day for every meal.

Lovely little cafe! The double chocolate madeleine is very good; the latte was good and BIG; and the staff was very friendly. Cute set up; good amount of seating. I visited during their soft launch so I'm guessing more is to come but so far it looks promising!

This place has the absolute cutest atmosphere. There's lots of seating, it was well decorated, and super clean. The perfect place to have a hot tea or coffee with one of their amazing madeleines. My favorite was the Lemon Madeleine... SO delicious. The staff was super kind and welcoming. A bit on the pricey side but totally worth it for the quality and experience! I can't wait for my next visit!

This is the place I've been wanting to visit to chat with my friends. They offer perfect sweets and drinks.
It's a must-visit spot! :)
"Happy and bright interior with delicious Berry Hug and Madeleine!!"
Omg finally we have K-bakery in CLT!! Love their Berry Hug croissant!! It was so good!!
such a pretty place
Fresh, unique, comport, healthy and delicious!
Great customer service and delicious desserts! This store opened recently and I strongly recommend visiting there.
